price: 79. Markaasaan ka aargudannay. Waxayna labaduba20 ku yaallaan waddo cad (oo weli) la maro.
footnotes: 20. Waxaa loola jeedaa magaalooyinka qoonkii Luud iyo Shucayb (Jetro).

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
